articles.author: Tribune Online
articles.title: Equities investors lose N137.2bn as investors book profits on Airtel Africa's stocks - Tribune Online
articles.description: "On Tuesday, equities trading at the Nigerian Exchange Limited (NGX) was unimpressive as the market erased most of the previous day's gains, leaving the benchmark index lower by 0.49 per cent to close at 51,448.53 basis points."

articles.title: INEC cannot be trusted, says Sowore - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: The presidential candidate of the African Action Congress, Omoyele Sowore, has said that the Independent National Electoral Commission cannot be trusted to conduct a free and fair election in Nigeria.
